1.12.2.1.12.2-0.0.1.0: The time machine is now available by default. Old west is a big desert.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.0.1.29: Mod is now server compatible. No more first travel crashes.
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.0.3: German translations! First API and some interesting internal work. Wait for updates...
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.2.3: Anti-cheat measures, Time Machine mechanics (overloading and cooling down), the Creative time machine item, temporal explosions and Heavy blocks. Better check it out yourself!
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.2.55: Italian and lots of new features! Just kidding, only Italian. :c
1.12.2.1.12.2-0.1.3.9: The new Temporal Cauldron and important bug fixes!

1.13.2.1.13.2-0.1.3.30: Update to 1.13.2 and first beta release.

1.14.2.1.14.2-0.1.4.0: Update to 1.14.2, gunpowder wire, and some translations.
1.14.2.1.14.2-0.1.4.1: Fix game crashes and translate to Chinese.

1.14.3.1.14.3-0.1.5.1: Update to 1.14.3 and some internal work.

1.14.4.1.14.4-0.1.7.0: Update to 1.14.4 and the Engineer Book!
